/*
    Just For You 97116:)
*/

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long unsigned llu;
typedef long long lld;
typedef long ld;
typedef stringstream ss;

//shortcuts
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
#define X real()
#define Y imag()

//important constants
#define pi M_PI
#define mod7 10000007
#define mod9 1000000009
#define mod97 1000000007
#define MAX 1000005
#define infi 2000000000 //infinity

//Read Inputs
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n);
#define sli(n) scanf("%lld",&n);

long long powerMod(long long a, long long b, long long c)
{
    long long result = 1;
    long long temp = 1;
    long long mask = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < 64; i++)
    {
        mask = (i == 0) ? 1 : (mask * 2);
        temp = (i == 0) ? (a % c) : (temp * temp) % c;
            
        if ((b & mask) == mask)
            result = (result * temp) % c;
    }
    return result;
}

inline void checkNagative(long long &tar) {
	 while (tar < 0) tar += mod97;
}

inline long long mul(long long tar, long long amt) {
	 checkNagative(tar);
	 checkNagative(amt);
	 if (tar >= mod97) tar %= mod97;
	 if (amt >= mod97) amt %= mod97;
	 tar *= amt;
	 if (tar >= mod97) tar %= mod97;
//	 checkNagative(tar);
	 return tar;
}


int main()
{
    lld t,n,m,i,j,k,l,x,y,z,flag,count,sum,a[MAX],b[MAX],c[MAX],d;
    char s[MAX],r[MAX];
    sli(t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        count=0,sum=0,flag=0;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        scanf("%lld",&x);
        for(j=1;j<n;j++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&m);
            x=mul(x,m);
        }
        printf("%lld\n",x);
    }
	return 0;
}
